# binary operator
记录下二元操作符｜ ^ & << >> + - * / %生成汇编
```
void main()
{
    int a;
    a | 3;
    a << 3;
    a + 3;
    a - 3;
    a * 3;
    a / 3;
    a % 3;
}
```

未经优化的汇编代码
```
# Code auto-generated by UCC

.data

.text

.globl	main

main:
	pushl %ebp
	pushl %ebx
	pushl %esi
	pushl %edi
	movl %esp, %ebp
	subl $32, %esp
.BB0:
	movl -4(%ebp), %eax
	orl $3, %eax
	movl -4(%ebp), %ecx
	shll $3, %ecx
	movl -4(%ebp), %edx
	addl $3, %edx
	movl -4(%ebp), %ebx
	addl $-3, %ebx
	movl -4(%ebp), %esi
	imull $3, %esi
	movl -4(%ebp), %eax
	movl $3, %edi
	cdq
	idivl %edi
	movl -4(%ebp), %eax
	movl $3, %edi
	cdq
	idivl %edi
.BB1:
	movl %ebp, %esp
	popl %edi
	popl %esi
	popl %ebx
	popl %ebp
	ret
```
